Effortless Kubernetes Scaling with Expert Karpenter Consulting

Stop overprovisioning and slash your AWS costs. We are a team of dedicated Karpenter developers and consultants who help you implement intelligent, automated node provisioning for your Kubernetes clusters.

Schedule a Free Consultation Explore Our Services

Is Your Kubernetes Cluster Costing You more?

Wasted Cloud Spend

Paying for idle compute capacity because the default Cluster Autoscaler is too slow or inefficient.

Complex Configuration

Struggling with dozens of node groups and complex taints/tolerations just to handle diverse workloads.

Poor Scaling Performance

Applications suffering from slow scale-up times, leading to poor user experience during traffic spikes.

Our Services

Your Trusted Karpenter Implementation Partner

We provide end-to-end Karpenter implementation services to ensure you get the most out of your AWS EKS environment.

Karpenter Setup & Migration

We'll handle the complete installation, configuration, and migration from Cluster Autoscaler to Karpenter with zero downtime.

Cost Optimization & Tuning

Our Karpenter experts will fine-tune your provisioners to use the most cost-effective EC2 instances, including Spot, saving you up to 70%.

Health Checks & Security

We perform comprehensive audits of your Karpenter setup to ensure it's secure, resilient, and following AWS best practices.

Performance Benchmarking

We analyze your workloads and configure Karpenter for optimal pod scheduling and lightning-fast node provisioning.

Managed Karpenter Services

Looking to hire a Karpenter developer on-demand? We offer managed services to monitor, maintain, and optimize your setup 24/7.

Team Training & Workshops

Empower your DevOps team with the skills to manage and scale your Kubernetes infrastructure effectively with Karpenter.

Why Choose Us?

We're Not Generalists. We're Karpenter Specialists.

While other consultancies treat Karpenter as a footnote, we live and breathe it. Our focused expertise means faster, more reliable, and more cost-effective results for your business. We are the freelance Karpenter consultants you can trust.

AWS Certified Professionals

Our team holds top AWS certifications, ensuring your infrastructure is built to the highest standards.

Proven ROI

We focus on delivering measurable cost savings and performance improvements from day one.

Transparent & Collaborative

We work as an extension of your team, providing clear communication and documentation every step of the way.

Our Process

Achieve Optimal Scaling in 3 Simple Steps

1. Discovery & Analysis

We start with a free, no-obligation call to understand your current setup, workloads, and goals for Kubernetes cost optimization.

2. Strategy & Implementation

We design a custom Karpenter strategy and handle the full implementation, configuring provisioners tailored to your specific needs.

3. Optimization & Handover

We monitor the results, fine-tune for peak performance and cost-efficiency, and provide your team with the knowledge to manage it.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

The biggest advantage is speed and efficiency. Karpenter provisions new nodes in seconds (not minutes) by interacting directly with the EC2 fleet API. It also eliminates the need for managing dozens of node groups. It simply looks at a pending pod's requirements (CPU, memory, architecture, etc.) and launches the most optimal, cost-effective instance to fit that exact need.

Savings vary, but many of our clients see a 30-60% reduction in their EKS compute costs. This comes from rightsizing instances on-the-fly, aggressively using Spot Instances for stateless workloads, and eliminating the waste from overprovisioned, static node pools.

Absolutely. We offer flexible engagement models, from project-based work for a specific implementation or migration, to hourly consulting and long-term managed services. We can provide a dedicated Karpenter developer or a full team based on your needs.

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Cookie Details

Strictly Necessary Cookies – Essential for the website to function.

Performance Cookies – Collect info about how visitors use our site.

Functionality Cookies – Remember user choices for enhanced functionality.

Targeting/Advertising Cookies – Deliver relevant ads and track performance.

You can manage your preferences through browser settings or by contacting our support.
